derivation: from a form of H6679 (צוּד) and meaning the same;
outline:
1. hunting, game
    1. hunting
    2. game hunted
  2. provision, food
    1. provision, food, food-supply
kjv_def: [idiom] catcheth, food, [idiom] hunter, (that which he took in) hunting, venison, victuals.
strongs_def: the chase; also game (thus taken); (generally) lunch (especially for a journey)
